channel.title: Just one simple question. how do i get 2 no-ip's
channel.description:
hey, its me azbaby!
I was just wondering cuase i want to advertise on rune locus with 2 ip's at the same time and i want to know how to do so? would u please help me.

item.title: Just one simple question. how do i get 2 no-ip's
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

To get your ‘No-ip’, first go to http://no-ip.com. Then register, after registered, and you’re on your account. Click ‘Add Host’ then create your ip for your server. Or dns. After you’ve created a host, download the No-ip DUC. Or click on downloads and download it. Open the duc after downloaded, click on the box next to the ip you have made. That should work. Good luck.

Read full topic
item.source: Just one simple question. how do i get 2 no-ip's
